{{CustomTabs|tab1=Overview|tab2=Reaction|tab3=Enemy|tab4=Weapon|tab5=Character|tab6=Talents}}
When a Talent is upgraded, its attribute values increase by a multiplier based on the Talent level:<ref>NGA: [https://bbs.nga.cn/read.php?tid=23915817 Level Scaling Formulas of Talents]</ref>

:<math>\text{Upgraded Talent Attribute Value} = (\text{Base Talent Attribute Value} \times \text{Talent Level Multiplier})</math>

Base Talent Attribute Value is the damage/healing/shield HP value a Talent has at level 1 (e.g. Geo Traveler's [[Starfell Sword]] has 248% Skill DMG at level 1).

Values with more digits can be checked in GitHub.<ref>Source Data: [https://github.com/Dimbreath/GenshinData/blob/master/ExcelBinOutput/ProudSkillExcelConfigData.json Talent Scalings]</ref>

*At first, Yoimiya's Elemental Skill [[Niwabi Fire-Dance]] appears to follow different scaling from the '''Elemental 2''' curve. However, the number in her Elemental Skill is multiplicative with all her normal damage. For example, at level 1, her Elemental Skill scales her damage by 138% (multiplies her damage by 1.38). However, if one considers the deviation from 100% (or the bonus from this skill), then it turns out this deviation follows the scaling on the '''Elemental 2''' curve (the Processed Value column subtracts 1 from the Original Value column).
